stench.name: Stench
stench.effect: By releasing a stench when attacking, the Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.effect: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

speedboost.name: Speed Boost
speedboost.effect: The Pokémon's Speed stat is boosted every turn.

battlearmor.name: Battle Armor
battlearmor.effect: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.effect: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

damp.name: Damp
damp.effect: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.

limber.name: Limber
limber.effect: The Pokémon's limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.

sandveil.name: Sand Veil
sandveil.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.

static.name: Static
static.effect: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity and may paralyze attackers that make direct contact with it.

voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.effect: If hit by an Electric-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.effect: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.effect: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts or being affected by Intimidate..

compoundeyes.name: Compound Eyes
compoundeyes.effect: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.effect: The Pokémon's insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

colorchange.name: Color Change
colorchange.effect: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.effect: The Pokémon's immune system prevents it from being poisoned.

flashfire.name: Flash Fire
flashfire.effect: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.

shielddust.name: Shield Dust
shielddust.effect: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.

owntempo.name: Own Tempo
owntempo.effect: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate..

suctioncups.name: Suction Cups
suctioncups.effect: The Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot. This protects it from moves and items that would force it to switch out.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

shadowtag.name: Shadow Tag
shadowtag.effect: The Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadows to prevent them from fleeing or switching out.

roughskin.name: Rough Skin
roughskin.effect: The Pokémon's rough skin damages attackers that make direct contact with it.

wonderguard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderguard.effect: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.effect: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

effectspore.name: Effect Spore
effectspore.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.effect: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.

clearbody.name: Clear Body
clearbody.effect: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

naturalcure.name: Natural Cure
naturalcure.effect: The Pokémon's status conditions are cured when it switches out.

lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningrod.effect: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted..

serenegrace.name: Serene Grace
serenegrace.effect: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.

swiftswim.name: Swift Swim
swiftswim.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.effect: By illuminating its surroundings, the Pokémon prevents its accuracy from being lowered.

trace.name: Trace
trace.effect: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.

poisonpoint.name: Poison Point
poisonpoint.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

innerfocus.name: Inner Focus
innerfocus.effect: The Pokémon's intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

magmaarmor.name: Magma Armor
magmaarmor.effect: The Pokémon's hot magma coating prevents it from being frozen.

waterveil.name: Water Veil
waterveil.effect: The Pokémon's water veil prevents it from being burned.

magnetpull.name: Magnet Pull
magnetpull.effect: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from fleeing by pulling them in with magnetism.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.effect: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

raindish.name: Rain Dish
raindish.effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

sandstream.name: Sand Stream
sandstream.effect: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.effect: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

thickfat.name: Thick Fat
thickfat.effect: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

earlybird.name: Early Bird
earlybird.effect: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

flamebody.name: Flame Body
flamebody.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

runaway.name: Run Away
runaway.effect: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

keeneye.name: Keen Eye
keeneye.effect: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

hypercutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hypercutter.effect: The Pokémon's prized, mighty pincers prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.effect: The Pokémon may pick up an item another Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

truant.name: Truant
truant.effect: Each time the Pokémon uses a move, it spends the next turn loafing around.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but lowers its accuracy.

cutecharm.name: Cute Charm
cutecharm.effect: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

plus.name: Plus
plus.effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

minus.name: Minus
minus.effect: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.effect: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

stickyhold.name: Sticky Hold
stickyhold.effect: The Pokémon's held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

shedskin.name: Shed Skin
shedskin.effect: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

guts.name: Guts
guts.effect: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

marvelscale.name: Marvel Scale
marvelscale.effect: The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost its Defense stat if it has a status condition.

liquidooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquidooze.effect: The strong stench of the Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.effect: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.effect: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.effect: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.effect: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

rockhead.name: Rock Head
rockhead.effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

drought.name: Drought
drought.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

arenatrap.name: Arena Trap
arenatrap.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing from battle.

vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.effect: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

whitesmoke.name: White Smoke
whitesmoke.effect: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

purepower.name: Pure Power
purepower.effect: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

shellarmor.name: Shell Armor
shellarmor.effect: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

tangledfeet.name: Tangled Feet
tangledfeet.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness if it is confused.

motordrive.name: Motor Drive
motordrive.effect: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Electric-type moves. Instead, its Speed stat is boosted.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.effect: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.effect: The Pokémon's determination boosts its Speed stat every time it flinches.

snowcloak.name: Snow Cloak
snowcloak.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in snow.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.effect: If the Pokémon is holding a Berry to be eaten when its HP is low, it will instead eat the Berry when its HP drops to half or less.

angerpoint.name: Anger Point
angerpoint.effect: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.effect: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.effect: The Pokémon's heatproof body halves the damage taken from Fire-type moves.

simple.name: Simple
simple.effect: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon's stat changes.

dryskin.name: Dry Skin
dryskin.effect: Restores the Pokémon's HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

download.name: Download
download.effect: The Pokémon compares an opposing Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

poisonheal.name: Poison Heal
poisonheal.effect: If poisoned, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.effect: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

skilllink.name: Skill Link
skilllink.effect: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.effect: Cures the Pokémon's status conditions in rain.

solarpower.name: Solar Power
solarpower.effect: In harsh sunlight, the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat is boosted, but its HP decreases every turn.

quickfeet.name: Quick Feet
quickfeet.effect: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.effect: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.effect: If the Pokémon's attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up even further.

magicguard.name: Magic Guard
magicguard.effect: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

noguard.name: No Guard
noguard.effect: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

stall.name: Stall
stall.effect: The Pokémon is always the last to use its moves.

technician.name: Technician
technician.effect: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.

leafguard.name: Leaf Guard
leafguard.effect: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

moldbreaker.name: Mold Breaker
moldbreaker.effect: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

superluck.name: Super Luck
superluck.effect: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.effect: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.effect: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.effect: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.effect: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target's stat changes.

tintedlens.name: Tinted Lens
tintedlens.effect: The Pokémon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.

filter.name: Filter
filter.effect: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

slowstart.name: Slow Start
slowstart.effect: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.effect: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It is also unaffected by Intimidate.

stormdrain.name: Storm Drain
stormdrain.effect: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted..

icebody.name: Ice Body
icebody.effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in snow.

solidrock.name: Solid Rock
solidrock.effect: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

snowwarning.name: Snow Warning
snowwarning.effect: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

honeygather.name: Honey Gather
honeygather.effect: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.effect: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.effect: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the plate it holds.

flowergift.name: Flower Gift
flowergift.effect: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of the Pokémon and its allies in harsh sunlight.

baddreams.name: Bad Dreams
baddreams.effect: Damages opposing Pokémon that are asleep.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.effect: The Pokémon steals the held item from attackers that make direct contact with it.

sheerforce.name: Sheer Force
sheerforce.effect: Removes any additional effects from the Pokémon's moves, but increases the moves' power.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.effect: Reverses any stat changes affecting the Pokémon so that attempts to boost its stats instead lower them— and attempts to lower its stats will boost them.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.effect: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.effect: If the Pokémon has any stat lowered by an opposing Pokémon, its Attack stat will be boosted sharply.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.effect: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP drops to half or less.

cursedbody.name: Cursed Body
cursedbody.effect: May disable a move that has dealt damage to the Pokémon.

healer.name: Healer
healer.effect: Sometimes cures the status conditions of the Pokémon's allies.

weakarmor.name: Weak Armor
weakarmor.effect: The Pokémon's Defense stat is lowered when it takes damage from physical moves, but its Speed stat is sharply boosted.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.effect: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

toxicboost.name: Toxic Boost
toxicboost.effect: Powers up physical moves when the Pokémon is poisoned.

flareboost.name: Flare Boost
flareboost.effect: Powers up special moves when the Pokémon is burned.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.effect: May create another Berry after one is used.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.effect: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.

moody.name: Moody
moody.effect: Every turn, one of the Pokémon's stats will be boosted sharply but another stat will be lowered.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.effect: The Pokémon takes no damage from sandstorms. It is also protected from the effects of powders and spores.

poisontouch.name: Poison Touch
poisontouch.effect: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.effect: The Pokémon has a little of its HP restored when withdrawn from battle.

bigpecks.name: Big Pecks
bigpecks.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from having its Defense stat lowered.

sandrush.name: Sand Rush
sandrush.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

wonderskin.name: Wonder Skin
wonderskin.effect: Makes status moves more likely to miss the Pokémon.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.effect: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's move if it is the last to act that turn.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.effect: The Pokémon fools opponents by entering battle disguised as the last Pokémon in its Trainer's party.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.effect: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.effect: The Pokémon's moves are unaffected by the target's barriers, substitutes, and the like.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.effect: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it shows moxie, which boosts its Attack stat.

justified.name: Justified
justified.effect: When the Pokémon is hit by a Dark-type attack, its Attack stat is boosted by its sense of justice.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.effect: The Pokémon gets scared when hit by a Dark-, Ghost-, or Bug-type attack or if intimidated, which boosts its Speed stat.

magicbounce.name: Magic Bounce
magicbounce.effect: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

sapsipper.name: Sap Sipper
sapsipper.effect: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Grass-type moves. Instead, its Attack stat is boosted.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.effect: Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.

sandforce.name: Sand Force
sandforce.effect: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

ironbarbs.name: Iron Barbs
ironbarbs.effect: The Pokémon's iron barbs damage the attacker if it makes direct contact.

zenmode.name: Zen Mode
zenmode.effect: Changes the Pokémon's shape when its HP drops to half or less.

victorystar.name: Victory Star
victorystar.effect: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon and its allies.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.effect: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.effect: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

aromaveil.name: Aroma Veil
aromaveil.effect: Protects the Pokémon and its allies from effects that prevent the use of moves.

flowerveil.name: Flower Veil
flowerveil.effect: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

cheekpouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheekpouch.effect: The Pokémon's HP is restored when it eats any Berry, in addition to the Berry's usual effect.

protean.name: Protean
protean.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

furcoat.name: Fur Coat
furcoat.effect: Halves the damage from physical moves.

magician.name: Magician
magician.effect: The Pokémon steals the held item from any target it hits with a move.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.effect: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat sharply when its stats are lowered by an opposing Pokémon.

strongjaw.name: Strong Jaw
strongjaw.effect: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.effect: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

sweetveil.name: Sweet Veil
sweetveil.effect: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep.

stancechange.name: Stance Change
stancechange.effect: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.

galewings.name: Gale Wings
galewings.effect: Gives priority to the Pokémon's Flying-type moves while its HP is full.

grasspelt.name: Grass Pelt
grasspelt.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.effect: The Pokémon passes its held item to an ally that has used up an item.

toughclaws.name: Tough Claws
toughclaws.effect: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.effect: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.effect: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

parentalbond.name: Parental Bond
parentalbond.effect: The parent and child attack one after the other.

darkaura.name: Dark Aura
darkaura.effect: Powers up the Dark-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

fairyaura.name: Fairy Aura
fairyaura.effect: Powers up the Fairy-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

aurabreak.name: Aura Break
aurabreak.effect: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

primordialsea.name: Primordial Sea
primordialsea.effect: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

desolateland.name: Desolate Land
desolateland.effect: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

deltastream.name: Delta Stream
deltastream.effect: The Pokémon changes the weather so that no moves are supereffective against the Flying type.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.effect: Boosts the Defense stat when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

wimpout.name: Wimp Out
wimpout.effect: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

emergencyexit.name: Emergency Exit
emergencyexit.effect: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

watercompaction.name: Water Compaction
watercompaction.effect: Boosts the Defense stat sharply when the Pokémon is hit by a Water-type move.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.effect: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

shieldsdown.name: Shields Down
shieldsdown.effect: When its HP drops to half or less, the Pokémon's shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.effect: Doubles the damage dealt to a target that has just switched into battle.

waterbubble.name: Water Bubble
waterbubble.effect: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves that hit the Pokémon and prevents it from being burned.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to drop to half or less.

slushrush.name: Slush Rush
slushrush.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in snow.

longreach.name: Long Reach
longreach.effect: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

triage.name: Triage
triage.effect: Gives priority to the Pokémon's healing moves.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.effect: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

surgesurfer.name: Surge Surfer
surgesurfer.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

schooling.name: Schooling
schooling.effect: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.effect: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

battlebond.name: Battle Bond
battlebond.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, its bond with its Trainer is strengthened, and its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats are boosted.

powerconstruct.name: Power Construct
powerconstruct.effect: Cells gather to aid the Pokémon when its HP drops to half or less, causing it to change into its Complete Forme.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.effect: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.effect: The Pokémon is always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack while in its sleeping state.

queenlymajesty.name: Queenly Majesty
queenlymajesty.effect: The Pokémon's majesty pressures opponents and makes them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

innardsout.name: Innards Out
innardsout.effect: When the Pokémon is knocked out, it damages its attacker by the amount equal to the HP it had left before it was hit.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.effect: Whenever a dance move is used in battle, the Pokémon will copy the user to immediately perform that dance move itself.

battery.name: Battery
battery.effect: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.effect: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.effect: The Pokémon dazzles its opponents, making them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

soul-heart.name: Soul-Heart
soul-heart.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat every time another Pokémon faints.

tanglinghair.name: Tangling Hair
tanglinghair.effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

powerofalchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
powerofalchemy.effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

beastboost.name: Beast Boost
beastboost.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat every time it knocks out a target.

rkssystem.name: RKS System
rkssystem.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the memory disc it holds.

electricsurge.name: Electric Surge
electricsurge.effect: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

psychicsurge.name: Psychic Surge
psychicsurge.effect: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

mistysurge.name: Misty Surge
mistysurge.effect: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

grassysurge.name: Grassy Surge
grassysurge.effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

fullmetalbody.name: Full Metal Body
fullmetalbody.effect: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

shadowshield.name: Shadow Shield
shadowshield.effect: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

prismarmor.name: Prism Armor
prismarmor.effect: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

neuroforce.name: Neuroforce
neuroforce.effect: Powers up the Pokémon's supereffective attacks even further.

intrepidsword.name: Intrepid Sword
intrepidsword.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

dauntlessshield.name: Dauntless Shield
dauntlessshield.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

libero.name: Libero
libero.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

ballfetch.name: Ball Fetch
ballfetch.effect: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

cottondown.name: Cotton Down
cottondown.effect: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stats of all Pokémon except itself.

propellertail.name: Propeller Tail
propellertail.effect: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

mirrorarmor.name: Mirror Armor
mirrorarmor.effect: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

gulpmissile.name: Gulp Missile
gulpmissile.effect: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.effect: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

steamengine.name: Steam Engine
steamengine.effect: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

punkrock.name: Punk Rock
punkrock.effect: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

sandspit.name: Sand Spit
sandspit.effect: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

icescales.name: Ice Scales
icescales.effect: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

ripen.name: Ripen
ripen.effect: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

iceface.name: Ice Face
iceface.effect: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.

powerspot.name: Power Spot
powerspot.effect: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

mimicry.name: Mimicry
mimicry.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.

screencleaner.name: Screen Cleaner
screencleaner.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

steelyspirit.name: Steely Spirit
steelyspirit.effect: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

perishbody.name: Perish Body
perishbody.effect: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

wanderingspirit.name: Wandering Spirit
wanderingspirit.effect: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

gorillatactics.name: Gorilla Tactics
gorillatactics.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

neutralizinggas.name: Neutralizing Gas
neutralizinggas.effect: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

pastelveil.name: Pastel Veil
pastelveil.effect: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

hungerswitch.name: Hunger Switch
hungerswitch.effect: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.

quickdraw.name: Quick Draw
quickdraw.effect: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

unseenfist.name: Unseen Fist
unseenfist.effect: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

curiousmedicine.name: Curious Medicine
curiousmedicine.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

chillingneigh.name: Chilling Neigh
chillingneigh.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

grimneigh.name: Grim Neigh
grimneigh.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

asone.name: As One
asone.effect: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.

lingeringaroma.name: Lingering Aroma
lingeringaroma.effect: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

seedsower.name: Seed Sower
seedsower.effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

thermalexchange.name: Thermal Exchange
thermalexchange.effect: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

angershell.name: Anger Shell
angershell.effect: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

purifyingsalt.name: Purifying Salt
purifyingsalt.effect: The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

well-bakedbody.name: Well-Baked Body
well-bakedbody.effect: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

windrider.name: Wind Rider
windrider.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

guarddog.name: Guard Dog
guarddog.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

windpower.name: Wind Power
windpower.effect: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

zerotohero.name: Zero to Hero
zerotohero.effect: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

commander.name: Commander
commander.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

electromorphosis.name: Electromorphosis
electromorphosis.effect: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

protosynthesis.name: Protosynthesis
protosynthesis.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

quarkdrive.name: Quark Drive
quarkdrive.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

goodasgold.name: Good as Gold
goodasgold.effect: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

vesselofruin.name: Vessel of Ruin
vesselofruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

swordofruin.name: Sword of Ruin
swordofruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

tabletsofruin.name: Tablets of Ruin
tabletsofruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

beadsofruin.name: Beads of Ruin
beadsofruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

orichalcumpulse.name: Orichalcum Pulse
orichalcumpulse.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

hadronengine.name: Hadron Engine
hadronengine.effect: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

opportunist.name: Opportunist
opportunist.effect: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

cudchew.name: Cud Chew
cudchew.effect: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

supremeoverlord.name: Supreme Overlord
supremeoverlord.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

costar.name: Costar
costar.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

toxicdebris.name: Toxic Debris
toxicdebris.effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

armortail.name: Armor Tail
armortail.effect: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

eartheater.name: Earth Eater
eartheater.effect: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

myceliummight.name: Mycelium Might
myceliummight.effect: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

hospitality.name: Hospitality
hospitality.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP.

mind'seye.name: Mind's Eye
mind'seye.effect: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

embodyaspect.name: Embody Aspect
embodyaspect.effect: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Cornerstone Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Defense stat to be boosted.

toxicchain.name: Toxic Chain
toxicchain.effect: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.

supersweetsyrup.name: Supersweet Syrup
supersweetsyrup.effect: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.

terashift.name: Tera Shift
terashift.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

terashell.name: Tera Shell
terashell.effect: The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

teraformzero.name: Teraform Zero
teraformzero.effect: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

poisonpuppeteer.name: Poison Puppeteer
poisonpuppeteer.effect: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.

dragonsmaw.name: Dragon's Maw
dragonsmaw.effect: Dragon's Maw increases the power of Dragon-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

soulheart.name: Soul-Heart
soulheart.effect: Soul-Heart raises the bearer's Special Attack one stage when any Pokémon on the field faints.
